releaseNotes:
Auto-generated from commit: feat: Complete chat system overhaul - WhatsApp-style real-time messaging

- Fixed socket delivery: notifyChat + notifyUser for dual-channel messaging
- Added Web Audio API beep for notification sounds (no file dependency)
- Fixed localStorage key bug in NotificationContext (7pet-auth-storage)
- Complete ClientChatPage redesign with fixed height layout and modern UI
- Added extensive socket logging for debugging
- Chat now works reliably between client and staff with instant notifications
